Sqor Athlete Mike Chabala, Shares Awkward First Kiss

Sqor’s very own Michael Chabala – professional soccer player interviewed on #firstkiss

Zoosk Dating reached out to us at Sqor to see if one of our single athletes would be interested in speaking about their love life. Zoosk knows how Sqor has exclusive content from professional, amateur, and retired athletes, so we were thrilled to get involved. Check out the full article here.
